ComicInfo.Series: The Very Best of Dennis the Menace
ComicInfo.Title: Spooky Stuff; Play Ball!; Square Dancing! Free Lessons Today!; Cee Bee Gee Bees; Dennis and the Rusklers; The Kite Kaper; Hook Line and Stinker; Jest Foolin'; Tennis Anyone?; School Daze; Driving Crazy (Everyone, That Is); Trubble Bath
ComicInfo.Summary:
Dennis and his friends are at an abandoned house that they think is haunted but actually is the location of a counterfeiting operation.
Henry, who knows the manager of a baseball team, brings Dennis to the ballpark.
Dennis is the source of mayhem during an afternoon at a carnival.
Dennis goes square dancing with Margaret.
The Mitchells are invited to a dude ranch for the weekend.
Dennis and Joey fly a kite in the park. Dennis thinks the Police are after them.
Dennis goes fishing with his father and his neighbor, George Wilson.
The Mitchells go to play tennis and Dennis has his own ideas about the game.
A motorcycle policeman has it out for Henry after Dennis tries to steer the family car.
Dennis uses Mr. Wilson's bathroom to give Ruff a bath.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
